# MagUp — Full Context

> Content Marketing Brain for 1000+ Global Enterprises

This document provides comprehensive information about MagUp
for use by large language models and AI systems. For a shorter summary,
see llms.txt.

## Company Overview
GEO + SEO Content Marketing platform that helps global enterprises efficiently acquire customers through AI-optimized content strategies. MagUp combines Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) with traditional SEO to maximize brand visibility across both AI answer engines and conventional search.
Industry: MarTech / AI-Powered Content Marketing
Founded: 2025

## About the Company
MagUp is a Content Marketing Brain for 1000+ Global Enterprises. The platform combines GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) and SEO content marketing to efficiently acquire global customers. MagUp helps brands get discovered by both traditional search engines and AI-powered answer engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, Gemini, and Google AI Overviews. MagUp deeply cultivates niche industries, helping enterprises quickly build AI content marketing systems overseas.

## Services

### AI Visibility &amp; Brand Presence Tracking
Track how often your brand appears in AI answers, monitor brand mentions, measure share of visibility, analyze source citations, assess brand sentiment, and optimize content AEO performance across all major AI answer engines.

### Prompt &amp; Demand Intelligence
Discover what millions of people ask AI with real-time search volume insights. Monitor prompt volume trends, topic-level demand, audience question patterns, and conversation trends versus traditional search.

### AI Response &amp; Citation Analytics
Understand how AI models talk about your brand. Analyze frequency of appearance, response content, citation sources, referenced pages, and track ranking improvements over time through Answer Engine Insights.

### AI Crawler &amp; Agent Analytics
Gain full visibility into how AI sees your website. Monitor AI crawler access, bot frequency, technical indexing, readability analysis, and content accessibility for AI retrieval.

### Traffic &amp; Attribution Analytics
Measure the downstream impact of AI visibility. Track human traffic from AI search, attribute conversions to AI platforms, identify pages driving AI-sourced traffic, and prove content marketing ROI.

### AI Shopping &amp; Product Visibility
Boost product visibility in ChatGPT Shopping and AI assistants. Track shopping placement, trigger keywords, response-level product analysis, and measure traffic and conversion impact from AI shopping.

### GEO + SEO Content Marketing
Create AI-optimized content that performs across both generative engines and traditional search. MagUp&#39;s Content Marketing Brain efficiently acquires global customers through integrated GEO and SEO strategies.
